consentModal.title: We value your privacy
consentModal.description:
Some cookies are necessary for the proper operation of our site. We also encourage you to agree to the use of analytical tool cookies. Thanks to them we can constantly improve the site. For more information, please visit Privacy Policy.

{{revisionMessage}}

sections.title: Necessary cookies
sections.description:
Necessary cookies are required for the operation of the site. Consent to the other categories, will help us improve the operation of the site.

Third-party companies, such as: Google, also store cookies. More information: data usage and privacy.

sections.title: Necessary cookies
sections.description: Necessary cookies are necessary for the proper operation of the site.

sections.title: Analytical cookies
sections.description: We use Google Analytics cookies. These cookies will be stored in your browser only with your prior consent.

body.name: _ga[_customname]
body.description: Registers a new identifier that is used to generate statistical data on website visits.

body.name: _gat[_customname]
body.description: Used to control the number of user browser requests to the server.

body.name: _gid
body.description: Registers an identifier that is used to generate statistical data on website visits.

sections.title: Advertising cookies
sections.description: Advertising cookies are used, among other things, to analyze the effectiveness of advertising activities and track conversions.

body.name: _fbp
body.description: Used to record and track data about user visits.

body.name: fr
body.description: Used to deliver customized ads and retargeting to users.

body.name: IDE
body.description: Used to deliver customized ads and retargeting to users.

body.name: _gcl_au
body.description: Used to store interaction data and track conversions.

body.name: NID
body.description: Used to deliver ads, retargeting and store user preferences.

body.name: RUL
body.description: Used to verify the correct display of ads on the site.

sections.title: User data related to ads
sections.description: Manages consent to send user data related to ads to Google.

sections.title: Personalized ads
sections.description: Manages consent to display personalized ads.

sections.title: Functional cookies
sections.description: Files responsible for the functioning of the site, e.g.: remembering the options selected by the user.

sections.title: Personalization cookies
sections.description: Files that enable personalization, such as: video recommendations.

sections.title: More info
sections.description: If you would like to learn more, we encourage you to read the following Privacy Policy.
